original_text: Continue to look towards the brick which has the picture of Jerusalem on it. Show that you are ready to attack it, like soldiers all around it. Speak my message to warn the city.
korean_text: 너는 또 네 얼굴을 에워싸인 예루살렘 쪽으로 향하고 팔을 걷어 올리고 예언하라

sentences.original_text: Continue to look towards the brick
which has the picture of Jerusalem on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 예루살렘 그림이 있는 벽돌을

sentences.original_text: Show that you are ready to attack it
